VR Game Design “Divine Tree” Based on Sanxingdui Cultural Relics The digitization of Chinese cultural relics is crucial for preserving information and transforming them into open educational resources. It enables active participation in public science education and promotes the global dissemination of Chinese cultural heritage. Virtual reality game technology has played a significant role in this process, allowing users to experience immersive environments and overcome physical limitations. This study aims to combine the digitization of cultural relics with virtual reality games to provide the public with engaging virtual models, contributing to the popularization and publicity of cultural relics.
